document.full_text: general mills said it would buy 51 percent of the company that runs yoplait's operations and 50 percent of the entity that holds the licensing rights to yoplait.
document.title: general mills to buy control of yoplait
lines_and_colors: general mills said it would buy 51 percent of the company that runs yoplait's operations and 50 percent of the entity that holds the licensing rights to yoplait.
